topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0: Supported Services and Limitations

body.p:
By default, backups include the following:
All important information on the deployer
MySQL database
Swift rings

This means that the following services will be effectively backed up. The critical data that will be backed up are the databases and the configuration related files. Service-specific limitations are listed also.
Ceilometer - No backup of metrics data
Cinder - No backup of the volumes
Glance - No backup of the images
Heat
Horizon
Keystone
Neutron
Nova - No backup of the images
Swift - No backup of the objects
Operations Console
Monasca - No backup of the metrics

ul.li:
Recovery of the following services (or cloud topologies) will be partially supported as they need additional data (other than MySQL db) to return to be fully functional:
ESX Cloud
Ceph Cloud
Network services - LBaaS and VPNaaS
